name: jeju
description: A network for agents and humans

scripts.clean: find apps packages vendor -type d -name node_modules -prune -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf node_modules .turbo && bun install
scripts.postinstall: cd packages/contracts && forge install --no-git && cd ../.. && bun run build:packages && bun run packages/deployment/scripts/setup-apps.ts && bun run link:cli
scripts.build:packages: bun run --cwd packages/types build && bun run --cwd packages/contracts build && bun run --cwd packages/cache build && bun run --cwd packages/db build && bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd packages/kms build && bun run --cwd packages/auth build && bun run --cwd packages/api build
scripts.link:cli: bun run --cwd packages/cli build && mkdir -p ~/.bun/bin && ln -sf $PWD/packages/cli/bin/jeju.js ~/.bun/bin/jeju
scripts.typecheck: turbo run typecheck --filter='!./vendor/*' && tsc --noEmit && pyright packages/training/python apps/dws/api && bun run typecheck:rust
scripts.typecheck:rust: bash -c '. $HOME/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null; cargo check --manifest-path apps/node/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml && cargo check --manifest-path apps/vpn/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml && cargo check --manifest-path apps/wallet/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml'
scripts.lint: biome check --write --unsafe packages/a2a packages/agents packages/api packages/auth packages/bots packages/bridge packages/cache packages/cli packages/config packages/db packages/deployment packages/durable-objects packages/eliza-plugin packages/kms packages/mcp packages/messaging packages/sdk packages/shared packages/solana packages/sqlit packages/tests packages/token packages/training packages/types packages/ui apps && ruff check packages apps --exclude packages/workerd --exclude packages/contracts --fix && ruff format packages apps --exclude packages/workerd --exclude packages/contracts && bun run lint:rust
scripts.lint:rust: bash -c '. $HOME/.cargo/env 2>/dev/null; cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/node/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml && cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/vpn/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml && cargo fmt --manifest-path apps/wallet/app/src-tauri/Cargo.toml'
scripts.ci: biome check packages apps && bun run typecheck && bun run test
